text: læa brrda phu xdthn doy hwang phra phaktr (khwam pordpran) khxng phracea khxng phwk khea læa darng kar lahmad læa bricakh sing thi rea di hı pen paccay yangchiph kæ phwk khea doy sxn ren læa peidphey læa phwk khea khcad khwam chaw dwy khwam di chn hela nan sahrab phwk khea khun thi phanak nı pan play thi di
